name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Sidebar + GPT-4o/4o mini + DALL·E 3, Gemini 1.5 Pro/Flash

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ⭐Use your own API Keys and get the cheapest access to ChatGPT and Gemini Models⭐

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🟢 NavChat: Your Ultimate AI-Powered Browsing Assistant

NavChat is a cutting-edge Chrome extension that integrates advanced OpenAI and Gemini technology to revolutionize your browsing experience. With NavChat, you can effortlessly analyse files, create screenshots, and ask questions about the web—all while surfing within the same browser window. 

This innovative tool allows you to seamlessly interact with the web, gather information, and perform various tasks without ever leaving the browser. NavChat's integration of AI technology makes it a powerful and efficient tool for users looking to streamline their online activities and access information quickly and easily.

🚀🚀 Key Features:

⭐ Use your own API keys:   Use OpenAI & Gemini API keys for the most cost effective and secure access. 

⭐ Advanced AI models: 
      ✅OpenAI GPT 3 and 4 series including GPT-4o
      ✅Gemini 1.5 Pro/Flash

⭐ Advanced AI Image generation: 
      ✅DALL·E 3

⭐ Privacy-Focused: Ensures completely anonymous usage. We don’t ask for your credit card or even your email.

⭐ You are in control:  Full control over the AI settings including Temperature, TopP and Max tokens. 


🚀🚀 Who is NavChat Suited For:

1️⃣ Academic Research: Ideal for students and teachers who need quick access to information, research assistance, and educational resources. 

2️⃣ Content Creators: Perfect for marketers, bloggers, and artists looking to generate content, brainstorm ideas, and create visuals effortlessly. 

3️⃣ Professional Assistants: Great for professionals who need help with emails, memos, and other administrative tasks. 

4️⃣ Endless Use Cases: Whether you’re a hobbyist, a tech enthusiast, or someone who just loves exploring the web, NavChat has something to offer for everyone.


🚀🚀 How NavChat Enhances Your Browsing Experience:

✅ Real-Time Assistance: Get instant answers and support while browsing, without having to switch tabs or search elsewhere.

✅ Context-Aware Interactions: NavChat understands the context of the webpage you’re on and provides relevant information and suggestions.

✅ Seamless Integration: The chat interface is conveniently accessible from a side panel, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted browsing experience.

✅ Task Automation: Automate repetitive tasks and streamline your workflow with intelligent chat commands.

✅ Enhanced Navigation: Receive step-by-step guidance for navigating complex websites, filling out forms, or completing online transactions.


NavChat is designed to be your personal web assistant, making your online activities more efficient, productive, and enjoyable. Whether you're conducting research, creating content, managing professional tasks, or simply exploring the web, NavChat is here to enhance your experience.

🚀🚀 Additional Benefits:

✅ Screenshot Creation: Capture and annotate screenshots effortlessly, perfect for creating tutorials, sharing feedback, or saving important information.

✅ Interactive Q&A: Ask questions about the web and receive detailed, AI-generated responses that help you understand and navigate content more effectively.

✅ Customizable Settings: Tailor NavChat to your preferences with customizable settings, ensuring that the extension works exactly how you need it to.

🟢 Why Choose NavChat?

✅ Efficiency: Save time by accessing information and performing tasks directly within your browser.

✅ Powerful AI: Leverage the latest advancements in AI technology to enhance your browsing experience.

✅ User-Friendly: Designed with a focus on ease of use, NavChatis intuitive and accessible for users of all skill levels.

✅ Privacy and Security: Your data and privacy are our top priorities. NavChat operates with complete anonymity, ensuring your information remains secure.

🟢 Get Started with NavChat:

Install the Extension: Add NavChat to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Set Up Your API Keys: Use your own API keys for personalized and secure access to AI features.
Start Browsing: Begin exploring the web with the enhanced capabilities of NavChat at your fingertips.

NavChat is more than just a browser extension—it's a comprehensive tool designed to transform the way you interact with the web. Experience the future of browsing with NavChat and unlock a world of possibilities.
